label: 六宗
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
説明文: Also Nanto Rokushū.  Sanron (Mādyamika), Hossō (Yogācāra), Kegon (Avatamsaka, with a dot above m"), Kusha (Abhidharma), Jōｊitsu (Satyasiddhi), and Ritsu (Vinaya) (p. 35). [南都六宗、三論、法相、華厳、倶舎、成実、律] "
